articles.description: PAUL NEWMAN: By resigning, Root has made it easier for the loyal Stokes to succeed him, rather than replace a friend who had been sacked.
articles.content:
Ben Stokes is the firm favourite to become England's Test captain after Joe Root jumped on Friday before he could be pushed by new managing director Rob Key.
Root, 31, resigned after five years that… [+2747 chars]

articles.title: 12-year-old Ukrainian refugee from Mariupol scores goal in Shakhtar Donetsk charity match - CNN
articles.description: For 12-year-old Dmytro Keda, after the worst few weeks imaginable, Thursday evening was a dream come true.
articles.content:
